title: Integrator Function Block
description: This function block performs integration on a given input value. It takes an input signal and integrates it over time, with optional parameters to specify the integration factor and to enable or disable the operation. It also allows for setting output limits to prevent the integrated value from exceeding predefined bounds.
name: FT_INT

input.name: IN
input.description: The input value to be integrated.

input.name: K
input.description: The integration factor, default is set to 1.

input.name: RUN
input.description: A boolean indicating whether the integration should run or not, default is TRUE.

input.name: RST
input.description: A reset flag that, when TRUE, resets the output to zero.

input.name: OUT_MIN
input.description: The minimum limit for the output, default is set to -1E+37.

input.name: OUT_MAX
input.description: The maximum limit for the output, default is set to 1E+37.

output.name: OUT
output.description: The result of the integration process.

output.name: LIM
output.description: A boolean indicating if the output has reached a limit.
